page.title: 06+++Chilton Primary School+++
page.content: *************************************** Chilton School opened on 7th.September 1950.85 children attended.Staff were:Mr F.J.Denzey,Headmaster,teaching Upper Juniors;Mrs.R.V.Boorman-Lower Juniors; Mrs.M.Denzey-Upper Infants; Mrs.J.C. Jefferies-Lower Infants. There were 2 kitchen staff and 1 dinner controller. The caretaker was Mr.H.W.Blissett. Today is 6th.June,1985.131 children are attending. Mr.J.R.Lemon is Headmaster, teaching 2nd.and 3rd.year Juniors part-time with Mrs.E.Garside. Mrs.J.Cabeldu,Deputy Head,teaches Lower Infants;Mrs.E.Wood-Upper Infants;Mrs.M. Mason-1st.year Juniors; Mr.D.J.Stemp- 3rd.and 4th.year Juniors;Mrs.A.Marriot- school secretary.There are 2 part-time classroom assistants, 2 kitchen staff, and 3 dinner controllers.The caretaker is Mr.C.Shaw. ***************************************
